cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENTPrinted for the War Cabinet. November 1940.secret.P. (40) 469.November 29, 1940TO BE KEPT UNDER LOCK AND KEY.It is requested that special care may be taken toensure the secrecy of this document.WAR CABINET.LOCKHEED LODESTAR AIRCRAFT.Memorandum by the Minister of Aircraft Production.AT a Cabinet Meeting (W.M. (40) 296th Conclusions, Minute 5) a decision was taken to transfer 8 Lodestars to the Air Ministry for use in civilian flyingexpeditions.As these aircraft are urgently desired by the Ministry of Aircraft Produc-tion for fitting with screens for the Long Aerial Mine, it is requested that thedecision should now be rescinded.The only other aircraft suitable for the purpose is the D.B. 7.Already 12 of these aircraft have been set aside for Long Aerial Mine-laying, and no more are available.. B.Ministry of Aircraft Production,November 29, 1940. .Copy No./[21971]
